title: An amount as may be decided by the Government shall be paid by the Owner / Developer / Society as additional Development Cess for the built up area over and above the Base FSI
clause_text: An amount as may be decided by the Government shall be paid by the Owner / Developer / Society as additional Development Cess for the built up area over and above the Base FSI. A corpus fund as decided by the Authority is to be created by the Developer which will take care of the maintenance of the building for a period of 10 years.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: An amount as may be decided by the Government shall be paid by the Owner / Developer / Society as additional Development Cess for the built up area over and above the Base FSI. A corpus fund as decide
